column4: My ndiswrapper problems seem to arise from irq assignments, checked my acpi log and from what I read I think it might be colliding with a usb hub, as you notice I am a layman and don't know what the next step would be. I want to be able to help myself though but if anyone could give me a nudge in the right direction I'd be grateful.
PCI devices can share IRQs just fine
I first read that ndiswrapper could have some problems, when i checked kern.log I thought it seemed right, maybe it was just wishful thinking from my side to find the problem :(
